memberdef.argsstring: (map< string, vector< double >> &table)
memberdef.name: updateTwiss

detaileddescription.para: Add ratiation integrals (I1-I5) per element to the Twiss Table Map. It also adds the relevant quantities to calculate them (e.g. curly H, rho, ...).

memberdef.argsstring: (string key, map< string, vector< double >> &table)
memberdef.name: printTwissMap

detaileddescription.para: Prints the values of the given Twiss column name. Mostly for debugging.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the column to print out.
Twiss Table Map to print from.
